Instance.description: A mapping which allows a single trait to be selected given a weighting value. Used by CAS Stories.

TunableList.name: traits
TunableList.description: A mapping between the weighting value and the trait that will be assigned. The keys of this map are thresholds. Example: if the desired behavior would be to assign trait_a if the weighting w is between 0.0 and 1.0 and trait_b if w > 1.0, then this map should have two entries: (0.0, trait_a), (1.0, trait_b). The weighting of the lowest weighted trait should always be 0.0, and a weighting of 0.0 will always select the lowest trait by convention (although the thresholds are otherwise non-inclusive).
